General.Name: Lovitt Resources Inc
General.Description: Lovitt Resources Inc., through its subsidiary, Lovitt Mining Company, Inc., engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States and Canada. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interests in the Lovitt gold mine; and other mining assets consisting of approximately 285 acres of land adjoining of Wenatchee, Washington. The company was formerly known as Lovitt Nutriceutical Corporation and changed its name to Lovitt Resources Inc. in September 2008. Lovitt Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Surrey, Canada.
